Articles.Content: I've been trying to fix this for months any ideas?

Moved to tech support.   
 

This was a very common issue a while back, there were a couple of sizable threads on it with remedies.  
 

But iirc, go into steam and validate your install, this is usually caused by a corrupt install?    (Rising voice at the end as I don’t recall the exact cause/fix).   If not a steam user, back up your saves and reinstall.
